mapper.select: select * from ProdQAs where product_id = #{product_id} order by ProdQA_ref desc, prodQA_refOrder asc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from ProdQAs where product_id = #{product_id} and prodQA_refOrder = #{prodQA_refOrder}
mapper.insert: insert into ProdQAs(product_id, member_id, prodQA_title, prodQA_content, prodQA_ref, prodQA_img, prodQA_isSecret, prodQA_secretPassword, prodQA_category) values(#{product_id}, #{member_id}, #{prodQA_title}, #{prodQA_content}, #{prodQA_ref}, null, #{prodQA_isSecret}, md5(sha1(#{prodQA_secretPassword})), #{prodQA_category})
mapper.select: select * from ProdQAs where product_id = #{product_id} and prodQA_no = #{prodQA_no}
